languages.text: Whenever the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerTacticianGlossary}Master Tactician{/g} spends {g|f:b669fe2c03a240fca1b3b2429ca87414}tactical advantage{/g} stacks on {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}abilities{/g}, the {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}critical damage{/g} dealt by the Master Tactician increases by +1% for every stack spent until the end of the {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}.
languages.original_text: Когда {g|Encyclopedia:CareerTacticianGlossary}мастер-тактик{/g} расходует Тактическое преимущество при применении {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}способностей{/g}, он наносит на 1% больше {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}критического урона{/g} за каждый потраченный уровень до конца {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}хода{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Whenever the Tactician spends Tactical Advantage stacks on abilities, Critical Damage dealt by the Tactician increases by +1% for every stack spent until the end of turn.
Whenever the Tactician spends Tactical Advantage stacks on abilities, Critical Damage dealt by the Tactician increases by +1% for every stack spent until the end of turn.
Whenever the Tactician spends Tactical Advantage stacks on abilities, the critical damage dealt by the Tactician increases by +1% for every stack spent until the end of the turn.

Whenever the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerTacticianGlossary}Master Tactician{/g} spends tactical advantage stacks on {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}abilities{/g}, the {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}critical damage{/g} dealt by the Master Tactician increases by +1% for every stack spent until the end of the {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}.

languages.text: Когда {g|Encyclopedia:CareerTacticianGlossary}мастер-тактик{/g} расходует {g|f:b669fe2c03a240fca1b3b2429ca87414}Тактическое преимущество{/g} при применении {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}способностей{/g}, он наносит на 1% больше {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}критического урона{/g} за каждый потраченный уровень до конца {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}хода{/g}.
languages.original_text: Whenever the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerTacticianGlossary}Master Tactician{/g} spends {g|f:b669fe2c03a240fca1b3b2429ca87414}tactical advantage{/g} stacks on {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}abilities{/g}, the {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}critical damage{/g} dealt by the Master Tactician increases by +1% for every stack spent until the end of the {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Когда {g|Encyclopedia:CareerTacticianGlossary}мастер-тактик{/g} расходует {g|f:b669fe2c03a240fca1b3b2429ca87414}Тактическое преимущество{/g} при применении {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}способностей{/g}, он наносит на 1% больше {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}критического урона{/g} за каждый потраченный уровень до конца {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}хода{/g}.
Когда тактик расходует Тактическое преимущество при применении способностей, он наносит на 1% больше критического урона за каждый потраченный уровень до конца {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}хода{/g}.

languages.text: 每当{g|Encyclopedia:CareerTacticianGlossary}战术专家{/g}的{g|Encyclopedia:Ability}能力{/g}消耗{g|f:b669fe2c03a240fca1b3b2429ca87414}“战术优势”{/g}层数时，每消耗1层，战术专家造成的{g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}暴击伤害{/g}就会提高1%，效果持续至{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}回合{/g}结束。
languages.original_text: Whenever the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerTacticianGlossary}Master Tactician{/g} spends {g|f:b669fe2c03a240fca1b3b2429ca87414}tactical advantage{/g} stacks on {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}abilities{/g}, the {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}critical damage{/g} dealt by the Master Tactician increases by +1% for every stack spent until the end of the {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}.

traits.locale_text: 每当战术专家的能力消耗战术优势层数时，每消耗1层，战术专家造成的{g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}暴击伤害{/g}就会提高1%，效果持续至{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}回合{/g}结束。

languages.text: Cada vez que el {g|Encyclopedia:CareerTacticianGlossary}maestro táctico{/g} gaste acumulaciones de {g|f:b669fe2c03a240fca1b3b2429ca87414}Ventaja táctica{/g} para utilizar {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}capacidades{/g}, el {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}daño crítico{/g} que inflige aumenta en un +1 % hasta el final del {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turno{/g} por cada acumulación gastada.
languages.original_text: Whenever the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerTacticianGlossary}Master Tactician{/g} spends {g|f:b669fe2c03a240fca1b3b2429ca87414}tactical advantage{/g} stacks on {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}abilities{/g}, the {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}critical damage{/g} dealt by the Master Tactician increases by +1% for every stack spent until the end of the {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Cada vez que el {g|Encyclopedia:CareerTacticianGlossary}maestro táctico{/g} gaste acumulaciones de Ventaja táctica para utilizar {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}capacidades{/g}, el {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}daño crítico{/g} que inflige aumenta en un +1 % hasta el final del {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turno{/g} por cada acumulación gastada.

languages.text: Wenn der {g|Encyclopedia:CareerTacticianGlossary}Meistertaktiker{/g} {g|f:b669fe2c03a240fca1b3b2429ca87414}Taktischer Vorteil{/g}-Stapel für {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}Fähigkeiten{/g} verbraucht, erhöht sich der von ihm zugefügte {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}kritische Schaden{/g} bis zum Ende des {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}Zuges{/g} für jeden verbrauchten Stapel um +1 %.
languages.original_text: Whenever the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerTacticianGlossary}Master Tactician{/g} spends {g|f:b669fe2c03a240fca1b3b2429ca87414}tactical advantage{/g} stacks on {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}abilities{/g}, the {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}critical damage{/g} dealt by the Master Tactician increases by +1% for every stack spent until the end of the {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Immer wenn der {g|Encyclopedia:CareerTacticianGlossary}Meistertaktiker{/g} Taktischer Vorteil-Stapel für {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}Fähigkeiten{/g} verbraucht, erhöht sich der von ihm zugefügte {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}kritische Schaden{/g} bis zum Ende des {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}Zugs{/g} für jeden verbrauchten Stapel um +1 %.

languages.text: Chaque fois que le {g|Encyclopedia:CareerTacticianGlossary}maître tacticien{/g} utilise des cumuls d'{g|f:b669fe2c03a240fca1b3b2429ca87414}Avantage tactique{/g} sur des {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}capacités{/g}, les {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}dégâts critiques{/g} qu'il inflige augmentent de +1 % par cumul utilisé jusqu'à la fin du {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}tour{/g}.
languages.original_text: Whenever the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerTacticianGlossary}Master Tactician{/g} spends {g|f:b669fe2c03a240fca1b3b2429ca87414}tactical advantage{/g} stacks on {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}abilities{/g}, the {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}critical damage{/g} dealt by the Master Tactician increases by +1% for every stack spent until the end of the {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Chaque fois que le Tacticien utilise des cumuls d'Avantage Tactique sur des capacités, les {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}dégâts critiques{/g} qu'il inflige augmentent de +1 % par cumul utilisé jusqu'à la fin du {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}tour{/g}.

traits.locale_text: {g|Encyclopedia:CareerTacticianGlossary}戦略の達人{/g}が{g|Encyclopedia:Ability}アビリティ{/g}で戦術的優位のスタックを消費する時、この{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}ターン{/g}終了まで、戦略の達人が与える{g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}クリティカルダメージ{/g}が、消費したスタック1につき+1%増加する。
